message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
Let's split it evenly. It's the fairest way to start.
You had your chance, now it's my turn again
I'm willing to compromise. Let's try 55/45 this time.  It's better than losing everything!
I'm not giving up, my turn again
We're getting closer to the end, let's be reasonable. I'll take 60, you get 40.  It's better than both of us getting nothing.
